00019         public function connect() {
00020                 $dbAddress = $this->config->db['host'];
00021                 $dbUser = $this->config->db['user'];
00022                 $dbPass = $this->config->db['password'];
00023                 $dbName = $this->config->db['name'];
00024                 if(!$this->dbLinkIdentifier) {
00025                         $this->dbLinkIdentifier = @mysql_connect($dbAddress, $dbUser, $dbPass);
00026                         if ($this->dbLinkIdentifier != 0) {
00027                                 if (mysql_select_db($dbName, $this->dbLinkIdentifier)) {
00028                                         return true;
00029                                 }
00030                                 else {
00031                                         return false;
00032                                 }
00033                         }
00034                         else {
00035                                 return false;
00036                         }
00037                 }
00038                 return true;
00039         }

00045         public function disconnect() {
00046                 if($this->dbLinkIdentifier){
00047                         if (mysql_close($this->dbLinkIdentifier) != 0) {
00048                                 $this->dbLinkIdentifier = null;
00049                                 return true;
00050                         }
00051                         return false;
00052                 }
00053                 return true;
00054         }

00062         public function queryDb($query) {
00063                 if(!$this->dbLinkIdentifier) {
00064                         if(!$this->connect()) {
00065                                 $this->error('Could not connect to database');
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068                 $this->resultResource = mysql_query($query, $this->dbLinkIdentifier);
00069                 $error = $this->getError();
00070                 if($error) {
00071                         $this->error($error);
00072                 }
00073                 if($this->resultResource && !is_bool($this->resultResource)) {
00074                                 $result = array();
00075                                 $field = array();
00076                                 $tempResults = array();
00077                                 $numOfFields = mysql_num_fields($this->resultResource);
00078                                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numOfFields; ++$i) {
00079                                         array_push($field,mysql_field_name($this->resultResource, $i));
00080                                 }
00081                                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($this->resultResource)) {
00082                                         for ($i = 0;$i < $numOfFields; ++$i) {
00083                                                 $tempResults[$field[$i]] = $row[$i];
00084                                         }
00085                                         array_push($result,$tempResults);
00086                                 }
00087                                 return($result);
00088                 }
00089                 return $this->resultResource;
00090         }

00124                         if(mysql_free_result($this->resultResource)){
00125                                 $this->resultResource = null;
00126                                 return true;
00127                         } else {
00128                                 return false;
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131                 return true;

00153         public function from() {
00154                 $tables = func_get_args();
00155                 if(is_array($tables[0])){
00156                         $tables = $tables[0];
00157                 }
00158                 foreach($tables as $table){
00159                         $this->query->from('`'.$this->escape($table).'`');
00160                 }
00161                 return true;
00162         }

00230         public function addWhere($column, $value=null, $comparison=null) {
00231 
00232                 if(is_object($value)) {
00233                         return $this->query->addWhere($this->escape($column), $value,  $this->escape($comparison));
00234                 }
00235                 if(is_null($comparison) && !is_null($value)){
00236                         $comparison = '=';
00237                 }
00238                 if(is_null($value)){
00239                         $value = 'NULL';
00240                 } else {
00241                         $value = '\''.$this->escape($value).'\'';
00242                 }
00243                 if($column && $comparison) {
00244                         return $this->query->addWhere($this->escape($column), $value, $this->escape($comparison));
00245                 } elseif($column && $value) {
00246                         return $this->query->addWhere($this->escape($column), $value, '=');
00247                 } elseif($column) {
00248                         return $this->query->addWhere($this->escape($column), '', '');
00249                 } elseif(!$column) {
00250                         $this->error('Column cannot be null');
00251                 }
00252         }

00322                 $query = $this->getSelect();

00324                 $this->freeResult($this->resultResource);
00325                 if($result && is_array($result)) {
00326                         $result = $result[0];
00327                 }
00328                 return $result;

00334         public function selectEnum() {
00335                 $table = $this->getTableString();
00336                 $column = $this->getColumnString();
00337                 $this->connect();
00338                 $sql = "SHOW COLUMNS FROM {$table} LIKE '{$column}'";
00339                 $result=mysql_query($sql, $this->dbLinkIdentifier);
00340                 if($error = $this->getError()) {
00341                         $this->error($error);
00342                 }
00343                 $options = array();
00344                 if(mysql_num_rows($result)>0){
00345                         $row=mysql_fetch_row($result);
00346                         $temp=explode("','",preg_replace("/(enum|set)\('(.+?)'\)/","\\2",$row[1]));
00347                         foreach($temp as $option){
00348                                 $options[$option] = $option;
00349                         }
00350                 }
00351                 return $options;
00352         }

00358         public function getSelect($queryObject=null) {
00359                 if(!is_null($queryObject)) {
00360                         $sql = "( \n /*begin subselect*/ \n".$queryObject->getSelect()."\n /*end subselect*/ \n)";
00361                 } else {
00362                         $sql= 'SELECT';
00363                         $sql .= $this->getColumnString($queryObject);
00364                         $sql .= ' FROM '.$this->getTableString($queryObject);
00365                         $sql .= $this->getJoinString($queryObject);
00366                         $sql .= $this->getWhereString($queryObject);
00367                         $sql .= $this->getGroupByString($queryObject);
00368                         $sql .= $this->getOrderByString($queryObject);
00369                         $sql .= $this->getLimitString($queryObject);
00370                         $sql .= $this->getOffsetString($queryObject);
00371                 }
00372                 return $sql;
00373         }

00520         private function escape($value) {
00521                 if(get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00522                         $value = stripslashes($value);
00523                 }
00524                 if(!$this->dbLinkIdentifier){
00525                         $this->connect();
00526                 }
00527                 return mysql_real_escape_string($value, $this->dbLinkIdentifier);
00528         }
00533         private function getColumnString() {
00534                 $sql = '';
00535                 $columns = $this->query->getColumns();
00536                 if($columns) {
00537                         $sql.= ' '. implode(", ", $columns) . "\n";
00538                 } else {
00539                         $sql .= ' * ' . "\n";
00540                 }
00541                 return rtrim($sql);
00542         }

00545                 $joins = $this->query->getJoins();
00546                 $sql = '';
00547                 if($joins) {
00548                         $sql .= "\n " . implode("\n ", $joins) . "\n";
00549                 }
00550                 return $sql;

00553         private function getTableString() {
00554                 $tables = $this->query->getTables();
00555                 $sql = '';
00556                 if($tables) {
00557                         $sql .= implode(', ', $tables) . "\n";
00558                 }
00559                 return $sql;

00562         private function getWhereString() {
00563                 $whereArray = $this->query->getWheres();
00564                 $sql = '';
00565                 if ($whereArray['columns']) {
00566                         $sql .= ' WHERE ';
00567                         foreach($whereArray['columns'] as $k=>$column) {
00568                                 if(is_object($whereArray['values'][$k])) {
00569                                         $whereArray['values'][$k] = $this->getSelect($whereArray['values'][$k]);
00570                                 }
00571                                 $whereString = "{$whereArray['columns'][$k]} {$whereArray['comparisons'][$k]} {$whereArray['values'][$k]}";
00572                                 if($k == 0) {
00573                                         $sql.= " $whereString \n";
00574                                         continue;
00575                                 }
00576                                 $sql .= "  AND $whereString \n";
00577                         }
00578                 }
00579                 return $sql;
00580         }

00586                 $sql.= ") \n";
00587                 return $sql;

00593                 $sql.= ' (';
00594                 $sql.= implode(', ', $values);
00595                 $sql.= ") \n";

00599         private function getFieldValueString() {
00600                 $fields = $this->query->getFields();
00601                 $values = $this->query->getValues();
00602                 $sql = '';
00603                 foreach($fields as $i=>$field) {
00604                         if($i != 0) {
00605                                 $sql .= ', ';
00606                         }
00607                         $sql .= ' ' . $fields[$i] . ' = '. $values[$i];
00608                 }
00609                 return $sql;
00610         }
